altername_name: Mastertronic Collection: HighScore Savers and TopScore Editions
name: The Mastertronic Quadrilogy Vol #1
overview: A fearsome foursome of gaming fun featuring: Big Mac Kane Hyperforce Squirm All games have been updated to fix some lingering errors, we've ability to maintain high scores and better add spaces or use the fire button to enter your name for posterity. Now you can compete for highest score with your buddies. Additionally, the ability to have infinite lives or resources or be invulnerable or reset the high scores has been made available so you can learn the game more quickly.
